attributes.action: Acknowledge the contribution made by Richard Noble to this country with a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The spirit of determination, guts, ingenuity, perseverance, intelligence and sheer will to win makes Richard Noble a role model for all Britains, young and old.
Not only has Richard Noble been a world land speed record holder in his own right, but he led the team build and run  a car to break the speed of sound, in addition to being instrumental in the project to create the worlds fastest diesel car. All remarkable achievements, all achievements for Britain. We should be proud.
